aboutUs.description: Welcome to the grooming salon "CHICA GROOM" in Berlin! We offer high-quality grooming services for your pets in a luxurious and calm environment. Our experienced staff specializes in a wide range of services for pets of all breeds and sizes. "CHICA GROOM" was developed with special attention to the comfort and safety of your pet. We strive to create a cozy atmosphere with soft colors, calming music and ergonomic design so that your beloved feels at home.

faq.question: Who are the grooming courses suitable for?
faq.answer: Our courses are ideal for everyone who wants to learn grooming as a new profession or already works in pet care and wants to expand their skills – as well as dog owners who want to learn how to properly care for their own animals. Both absolute beginners and experienced groomers are welcome.

faq.question: What makes your grooming courses unique?
faq.answer: We work with a structured curriculum, provide a complete set of tools and training materials, combine training mannequins with real dogs in a comfortable environment, and award certificates of participation. Additionally, you receive 24/7 support from our groomers for one year.

faq.question: How does the offline course work?
faq.answer: The next group starts on April 6, 2026. The basic course includes 40 hours (once a week on weekdays over 5 weeks), the Pro Grooming Course 80 hours (twice a week on weekdays over 5 weeks). Course times can be individually adjusted. No prior experience is necessary – we start from scratch.

faq.question: What is included in the price of the offline course?
faq.answer: The course price includes a complete tool set (scissors, combs, apron, clipper with attachments), training materials, a practice mannequin, practical training in the salon, and a certificate of participation.

faq.question: In which language is the offline course held and where is it?
faq.answer: The main language is English. Upon request, the course can also be accompanied in Ukrainian or Russian. Classes take place at Chica Groom salon, Raumerstraße 30, 10437 Berlin.

faq.question: Can I groom dogs after the offline course and continue practicing?
faq.answer: Yes, you will acquire all the basic skills to safely groom dogs. We recommend an intensive practice phase after the course to solidify technique and safety. For this, we offer up to 3 months of free practice in our salon – you choose the times yourself.

faq.question: How does the online course work?
faq.answer: The online course starts immediately after registration. Our manager will send you payment information, the tool set, all training materials, and access to video lessons. You learn at your own pace, completely flexible.

faq.question: What is included in the price of the online course?
faq.answer: The price includes video lessons, a complete tool set (scissors, combs, apron, clipper with attachments), training materials, a practice mannequin, and a certificate of participation. Here too: no prior experience necessary.

faq.question: In which language is the online course?
faq.answer: The video lessons are in English, with Russian or German subtitles. This way you can learn in the language that is most convenient for you.

faq.question: What practice and techniques do I learn in the course?
faq.answer: You learn clipper and scissor cuts, hygiene grooming, coat care, and working with different breeds. The course involves working with practice mannequins and real dogs. There are demonstrations on models and cutting diagrams for orientation.

faq.question: Which breeds do I work with, how large are the groups, and do I need to bring tools?
faq.answer: We work with Poodles, Spitz, Yorkies, Maltipoos, Maltese, and other breeds. The offline group size is a maximum of 6 people, so everyone gets adequate attention. All necessary tools are provided – you don't need to bring anything of your own.

faq.question: Do I need an official diploma or license as a groomer in Germany and what certificate do I get?
faq.answer: The profession of pet groomer is not subject to licensing in Germany. For work, practice, experience, and safe handling of animals are most important. You will receive a certificate of participation from Chica Groom, which confirms your skills, but does not replace a state-recognized diploma. The course is a practical introductory format and not an official training program.

faq.question: Can I work as a groomer after the course and do you support job searches?
faq.answer: Yes, the course provides practical skills for starting work with clients or in a salon. We don't guarantee employment, but support with advice, practice tips, and often collaborations with salons emerge – many graduates already work independently or in teams.

faq.question: Are there additional masterclasses for specific breeds?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer individual and group masterclasses for different breeds. You can register in advance via WhatsApp. The price for a masterclass is 390 € plus 19% VAT.

faq.question: How does payment work and is installment payment possible?
faq.answer: Yes, installment payment is possible: 50% before the course starts and 50% on the last course day. For the online course, payment is made in full at the beginning. You can pay by credit card, bank transfer, or invoice.

faq.question: How do I register for the course?
faq.answer: You can apply through the form on our website or contact us directly via WhatsApp at +49 152 02433344. We are happy to advise you and help you choose the right format.
